attributes.action: Give Parents the right of choice over their children’s MMR vaccinations, by allowing them the right to decide how their children are inoculated..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow parents the right to choose whether their children have the MMR Vaccination which is provided free on the NHS OR the right to be able to choose properly licensed single Measles, Mumps and Rubella vaccinations administered by their GP if they are willing to fund the extra cost of the vaccinations themselves. This petition would allow parents who are worried about side effects to protect their children; this would also improve the take up of inoculations and prevent future measles outbreaks.
